text: Ayaz Niyazi oglu Mutallibov (, ; 12 May 1938 - 27 March 2022) was an Azerbaijani politician. He was the last leader of Soviet Azerbaijan. Mutallibov was also the first President of independent Azerbaijan. He was president from October 1991 until May 1992. Mutallibov died on 27 March 2022 in Baku, Azerbaijan at the age of 83.Former President of Azerbaijan Ayaz Mutallibov died ==References== ==Other websites== *Ayaz MÃ¼tallibov Category:1938 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Presidents of Azerbaijan Category:Prime ministers of Azerbaijan Category:Azerbaijan Communist Party (1920) politicians Category:Soviet politicians Category:Politicians from Baku Category:Azerbaijani communists Category:20th-century Azerbaijani people
title: Ayaz Mutallibov
